title: AE脚本：动态贴图快速制作 Aescripts Ray Dynamic Texture V1.1 + 视频教程
author: 大众脸
content: Ray Dynamic Texture 脚本可以解决繁琐的图层纹理贴图工作，能够快速方便在AE软件里给图层添加各种纹理贴图，包括图层的设置、应用效果、关键帧和图层样式，表达式等。除此之外，该脚本工具可以存储您最常用的贴图效果预设，点击即可应用到图层上。

other.installation: 拷贝.jsxbin脚本文件到AE安装目录下：Support Files\Scripts\ScriptUI Pane
other.usage: 在AE软件中点击 Window（窗口菜单）即可找到脚本。
update_log: 1.1 (Current version) – Apr 19, 2017 – Added support for Layer Styles – Fixed Shape Layer positioning – Fixed multiple layer texturing issue – Fixed scaled and rotated texture issue
1.0.3 – Mar 3, 2017 – Added support for foreign language versions of AE
1.0.2 – Mar 17, 2017 – Additional fix to “writeln” issue – Added pref to not rename effects for Duik compatibility – Added additional code credit
